game.name: Chocolate Nests
game.description:
Have you invited your friends to your home and now you want to serve some fun and sweet treats to them? No need to bother friends! You are at the right place since today Chocolate Nests game brings you a wonderful opportunity to learn how to prepare a delicious dessert recipe. Luckily, these chocolate nests are extremely cute and much capable of satisfying the sweet urges of anyone. It is easy and simple to prepare this awesome dessert by just following a few simple instructions and indications. 

Take a bowl and mix some golden syrup, chocolate buttons, cocoa powder and butter into it. Now find out an oven and put your mixture into it until you will see melting chocolate and will obtain a sort of ganache. Take another bowl and mix the chocolate mixture you have created now with some shredded wheat. See the working space and put some balls over there with the help of a spoon. Create chocolate nests by pressing them. Then place them in nice muffin cups. 

Once it is done, start initiating some mini chocolate eggs in a sort of a colourful sugar glaze. Try to do it in three different great colors. Then place them in some perfect combinations in your chocolate nests. Your mouth-watering dish is ready now. Serve it on a plate to your friends and family. Hope all would fall in love with it and appreciate your cooking skills in this cool kitchen game for girls. Do it on your own without asking any help from your mom. Good luck ladies!
